languages.text: "Ей известно, что мы используем "Амасекус" для встреч. Если вы передадите блюстителям, что я здесь и меня можно брать, она придет, и вряд ли в обнимку со своим троном. Мы заманим ее в ловушку, убьем, вернем себе Футфол".

"She knows we use the Amasecus as our meeting place. If you let the enforcers know I can be found and grabbed in here, she will come — and she will hardly drag her throne with her. We'll lure her into a trap, kill her, and take back Footfall."
languages.original_text: "Ей известно, что мы используем "Амасекус" для встреч. Если вы передадите блюстителям, что я здесь и меня можно брать, она придет, и вряд ли в обнимку со своим троном. Мы заманим ее в ловушку, убьем, вернем себе Футфол".

traits.locale_text: "She knows we use the Amasecus as our meeting-place. If you let the enforcers know I can be found and grabbed in here, she will come — hardly with her throne in tow, I imagine. We'll lure her into a trap, kill her, and take back Footfall."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "She knows we use the Amasecus as our meeting-place. If you let the enforcers know I can be found and grabbed in here, she will come — hardly with her throne in tow, I imagine. We'll lure her into a trap, kill her, and take back Footfall."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "She knows we use the Amasecus as our meeting place. If you let the enforcers know I can be found and grabbed in here, she will come — hardly with her throne in tow, I imagine. We'll lure her into a trap, kill her, and take back Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "She knows we use the Amasecus as our meeting place. If you let the enforcers know I can be found and grabbed in here, she will come — and she will hardly drag her throne with her. We'll lure her into a trap, kill her, and take back Footfall."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "She knows we use the Amasecus as our meeting place. If you let the enforcers know I can be found and grabbed in here, she will come — and she will hardly drag her throne with her. We'll lure her into a trap, kill her, and take back Footfall."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “她很清楚我们一直在烈酒修会见面。如果您能想办法告知她的执法者，说我此刻就在烈酒修会，只要来这里就能抓到我，那她肯定会杀过来，而且恐怕不会带着那把椅子。我们可以把她引到陷阱里，杀了她，夺回落脚港。”
languages.original_text: "She knows we use the Amasecus as our meeting place. If you let the enforcers know I can be found and grabbed in here, she will come — and she will hardly drag her throne with her. We'll lure her into a trap, kill her, and take back Footfall."

traits.locale_text: “她知道，我们一直在烈酒修会见面。如果您能想办法告知她的执法者，说我此刻就在烈酒修会，只要来这里就能抓到我，那她肯定会来，而且恐怕不会带着那张椅子。我们可以把她引到陷阱里，杀了她，夺回落脚港。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「私たちがアマセックで会っている事に、彼女は気付いている。ここに来れば私を見つけられるとエンフォーサーに伝えれば、彼女は来る。それも、王座を引きずってきたりなどしない。彼女を罠に誘い込んで殺し、フットフォールを取り戻しましょう」
languages.original_text: "She knows we use the Amasecus as our meeting place. If you let the enforcers know I can be found and grabbed in here, she will come — and she will hardly drag her throne with her. We'll lure her into a trap, kill her, and take back Footfall."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちがアマセックで会っている事に、彼女は気付いている。ここに来れば私を見つけられるとエンフォーサーに伝えれば、彼女は来る。それも、王座を引きずってきたりなどしない。彼女を罠に誘い込んで殺し、フットフォールを取り戻しましょう」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Sabe que usamos el Amasecus como lugar de reunión. Si le hace saber al personal de seguridad que pueden encontrarme aquí, vendrá, y dudo que traiga su trono a cuestas. Le tenderemos una trampa, la mataremos y recuperaremos Paso».
languages.original_text: "She knows we use the Amasecus as our meeting place. If you let the enforcers know I can be found and grabbed in here, she will come — and she will hardly drag her throne with her. We'll lure her into a trap, kill her, and take back Footfall."

traits.locale_text: «Sabe que usamos el Amasecus como lugar de reunión. Si le hace saber al personal de seguridad que pueden encontrarme aquí, vendrá, imagino que difícilmente con su trono a cuestas. Le tenderemos una trampa, la mataremos y recuperaremos Paso».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Sie weiß, dass wir das Amasecus als Treffpunkt genutzt haben. Wenn Ihr den Enforcers sagt, dass man mich dort findet und ergreifen kann, dann kommt sie. Wohl kaum mit ihrem Thron im Schlepptau, nehme ich an. Wir locken sie in eine Falle, töten sie und erobern Footfall zurück."
languages.original_text: "She knows we use the Amasecus as our meeting place. If you let the enforcers know I can be found and grabbed in here, she will come — and she will hardly drag her throne with her. We'll lure her into a trap, kill her, and take back Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Sie weiß, dass wir das Amasecus als Treffpunkt genutzt haben. Wenn Ihr den Enforcers sagt, dass man mich dort findet und ergreifen kann, dann kommt sie. Wohl kaum mit ihrem Thron im Schlepptau, nehme ich an. Wir locken sie in eine Falle, töten sie und erobern Footfall zurück."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Elle sait que nous utilisons l'Amasecus comme lieu de réunion. Si vous informez les prévôts qu'ils peuvent me trouver et m'arrêter ici, elle viendra elle-même... sans son trône, à mon avis. Nous l'attirerons dans un piège, nous la tuerons et nous reprendrons Castel. »
languages.original_text: "She knows we use the Amasecus as our meeting place. If you let the enforcers know I can be found and grabbed in here, she will come — and she will hardly drag her throne with her. We'll lure her into a trap, kill her, and take back Footfall."

traits.locale_text: « Elle sait que nous utilisons l'Amasecus comme lieu de réunion. Si vous informez les prévôts qu'ils peuvent me trouver et m'arrêter ici, elle viendra elle-même... sans son trône, à mon avis. Nous l'attirerons dans un piège, nous la tuerons et nous reprendrons Castel. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Amasekus'ta buluştuğumuzu biliyor. İnfazcılara burada olacağımı söylerseniz İncendia gelecektir. Yanında tahtını getireceğini hiç sanmıyorum. Tuzağımıza düşecek ve geberecek. Biz de Binliman'ı geri alacağız."
languages.original_text: "She knows we use the Amasecus as our meeting place. If you let the enforcers know I can be found and grabbed in here, she will come — and she will hardly drag her throne with her. We'll lure her into a trap, kill her, and take back Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Amasekus'ta buluştuğumuzu biliyor. İnfazcılara burada olacağımı söylerseniz İncendia gelecektir. Yanında tahtını getireceğini hiç sanmıyorum. Tuzağımıza düşecek ve geberecek. Biz de Binliman'ı geri alacağız."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
